name: Sanctioned Purifier

skills.name: Blessed Missiles
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Whiplash
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Fiend Purge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy with 2 random allies.
Damage inflicted by this Champion and any allies joining this attack will be increased by 10% if the target is under a [Stun] debuff. Allies joining the attack use their default skills

faction.name: Sacred Order
faction.default_description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 53 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 47 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: For centuries the Knights of the Sacred Order were charged with cleansing Teleria of evil in all its guises. But since the declaration of war, they have sworn allegiance to the Queen of Aravia. In league with the Queen's Necromancer, these once-holy knights now enforce her Majesty's will and guard her chattel.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Sanctioned Purifier is a epic attack champion from the faction Sacred Order doing force damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Sacred Order, Sanctioned Purifier is a champion of Epic rarity and of Attack type
